QuestData.Title: Flame On
QuestData.Description: Alright $n, we've saved as many as we could but now we need to make sure this disaster doesn't spread any further.$b$bThe firebombs are wired up and ready to go.$b$bKimzee just finished work on the flying machine so we're ready to ride back to the Gearworks as soon as we're finished.$b$bYou've done all the hard work so I think you should get the honors of triggering it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Firebomb Plunger then ride on Kimzee's Flying Machine.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, you did fantastic work.$b$bEveryone here at the Gearworks owes you big time for what you've done for us.$b$bHere, I want to give you little something. Think of it as a personal token of my gratitude.
